text: Marhoom Baba Zahiere Lye (7 November 1900 - 1969) was a Ceylonese Malay politician. He appointed as Member of Parliament in 1963.Parliaments of Ceylon. Associated Newspapers of Ceylon, 1960. p. 166 He married Evelyn Mashmoon Saldin, daughter of M. K. Saldin, member of the State Council of Ceylon. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:1969 deaths Category:Members of the 5th Parliament of Ceylon Category:Sri Lankan Malay politicians
title: Baba Zahiere Lye
